overview: Afe lives with his father. There seem to be problems communication at home. Afe plays rugby in a local club. There seem to be communication problems with them his teammates. Afe wants to prove he is good in front of his coach. They seem to exist communication problems between them. Afe is struggling to maintain his composure.

production_companies.name: Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki

title: The Sound of Violence
